text: Castanopsis kawakamii is a species of plant in the family Fagaceae. It is found in China, Taiwan, and Vietnam. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== kawakamii Category:Near threatened plants Category:Trees of China Category:Trees of Taiwan Category:Trees of Vietnam Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot Category:Taxa named by Bunzō Hayata
title: Castanopsis kawakamii
